name: Meteor Hammer
description: An enchanted hammer forged of metals discovered in the ruins of a village destroyed by a great star storm.

abilities.name: Meteor Hammer
abilities.description: After a successful channel, summons a meteor that strikes down at the target area after a delay, stunning enemies and dealing impact damage. Slows movement speed and continues to deal damage over time to enemy units for a while.
notes: Interrupting the channeling causes the ability to do nothing, consuming mana and going on cooldown
Provides flying vision within the targeted area for 2.8 seconds, starting upon channel beginning
The meteor takes 0.5 seconds to land
Upon landing, all enemies within the area, including buildings but excluding wards, get damaged, stunned, and receive a damaging debuff
The meteor first applies the debuffs, then the impact damage
Deals damage in 1-second intervals, starting 1 second after the debuff is placed, resulting in 7 total instances
Can deal a total of 430 damage (before reductions)
Multiple casts on the same targets do not stack but refresh the duration instead
Destroys trees within the radius upon impact
Does not share a cooldown with Fallen Sky

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 132 health and 0.6 health regeneration
288 mana, 1.2 mana regeneration and 2.4% flat base magic resistance
6, 6 and 24 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes respectively
16.2 main attack damage to universal heroes
Multiple sources of spell damage amplification do not stack
Multiple sources of mana regeneration amplification do not stack
